summary: This document is a Certificate of Existence issued by Gregory R. Francis, the Lieutenant Governor of the Virgin Islands, certifying that Hyperion Air, LLC was duly organized under the laws of the United States Virgin Islands on October 19, 2012. It confirms the company's perpetual duration and compliance with applicable fees.

persons.name: Gregory R. Francis
persons.context: Gregory R. Francis is the Lieutenant Governor of the Virgin Islands who issued the Certificate of Existence for Hyperion Air, LLC.

keyFacts: Hyperion Air, LLC was organized on October 19, 2012.
The company has a perpetual duration.
All applicable fees have been paid by the company.
No Articles of Termination have been filed by the company.
